Detailed Description

an Object is a four-dimensional geometrical object which can not be described as a mathematical function from R³ to R or from R² to R^4. Instead it is described as a set of surfaces.

Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>

unsigned  vertices,

transforms an Object
as I look at it, i think this could be optimized by making the transformation matrices static and only canging the corresponding entries... but how to make this beautifully, i don't know
